a = 00000101
b = 00001001

-> a & b
  00000101
& 00001001
----------
  00000001
  
-> a | b
  00000101
& 00001001
----------
  00001101
  
-> a ^ b
  00000101
& 00001001
----------
  00001100
  
-> ~a
00000101
--------
11111010
  
-> b << 1
00001001
--------
00010010

-> b >> 1
00001001
--------
00000100
